reviews.review: Its Portal freakin 2. How could I not recommend it.
Muito bom! um dos jogos mais divertidos que já joguei vale a pena!
Awesome!!!

Buenisimo para jugar en cooperativo, así como en solitario. Merece la pena cada euro/dolar que cuesta.

Altamente recomendado, algunos mapas son un reto.

Trae editor de mapas para crear tus propios mapas. También tiene soporte de Steam Workshop asi que podrás descargar mapas creados por otros usuarios, el juego es interminable y buenisimo :)

You MUST play this. For science, you monster.
One of the few games that easily pass the "Test of Time" ;)

Very polished, but disappointing overall:

-The game was waaaay too easy.
-The puzzles weren't as challenging as Portal 1, I suspect because of console controls being taken into consideration this time around. 
-The puzzles just started getting interesting as you finished the game. The game needed to start at the difficulty it finished at.
-Multiplayer was good fun, however the lack of challenge still applies.
Is has been a year to play this again, and it still gots me! Awesome!

Portal 2 is a very fun game. There are much more Puzzles, story is great as well.
The puzzles are well made. You should definitely get it.
Do moar sciencing!

Mais um jogo triplo A pra quem gosta de minimalismo e bons desafios. Jogar Portal 2 em 3D é mandatorio, se torna outro jogo chegando a ser hipnotizante.

Bon pour commencer éviter les vidéos de JV.com si vous ne voulez pas vous spoiler le début ou autres, Portal était novateur il ne les plus mais n'a vraiment pas perdu de sont charme toujours aussi tordu et si j’hésitai encore si le programmeur était un génie ou un cingler de première je pourrait maintenant vous dire qu'il est simplement un mélange des 2, graphiquement j'ai remarquer une net amélioration surtout pour les ombres qui sont fabuleuse, je vous conseille de télécharger les mises a jours avant de jouer car les retours sur bureaux sont fréquent et énervant, mais pourquoi 16/20? parce que Portal 2 n'est malheureusement plus novateur, mais n'en ai pas moins sublime. :D
Amazing FPS/Puzzler. Best physics out
Great sequel to a great game.
This is probaly one of the best puzzle games around. With a great cast of voice actors and top notch gameplay you are in for one hell of a ride. I recommend this to any fan of valves game. 9.5/10
Ótima dublagem dos personagens. História interessante, com leves toques de comédia.

Somehow better than Portal! With the intoduction of the new character Wheatly, you'd be afraid he'd take away from Glados, but he doesn't. Wheatly ads a wonderful new personality to the previously lonely and solitary environment. New items, gels and puzzles will keep you on your toes!
Unbelievably good fun, hilarious wriiting and ingenious puzzles. Might be better than the first.
JAJAJAJAJJAJAJAJJ

Portal 2 deserves every shred of praise it has ever received. The single player campaign is deeply satisfying, the voice acting is simply wonderful, the gameplay is sharper and more responsive than Portal 1 (which is still an amazing game), the visuals are incredible, the puzzles force you to think (always a good thing), and the 2-player co-op action is top-notch. You and a buddy take on entirely new challenges (with an underlying story) as the robots Peabody and Atlas.

...and now I want to play through the game again. :)

All the in-I mean fun of the last game, now with Co-Op.
This is also not a paid review.
GLaDOS also had nothing to do with this.

ポテトグラたんに萌えるというAI萌えを加速させる非常に罪な作品。
前作ではそこまで深くストーリーがなかったものの、今作ではとっても充実。それだけでもなかなかの良作なのだけれども、CO-OPがあったりステージを自分で作ることが出来たりともうプレイヴァリュー最大限でなんとセール中ならお値段4.99USDという破格。
中身は前作と同じようなFPS+パズルゲームだけれども、新たな要素も加わってよりアクティブなパズルになっている。これにはホント作り手に脱帽モノ。
Macht viel spaß besonderst zu zweit. Ich finde es hat eine gute Story und gute Rätsel.
Portal 2 is fun! I really enjoy the multiplayer!

it's a very good continuation of Portal. It includes more elements and a more deeper understanding of the plot.

If only some smooth jazz was dispensed then bugger.

Fun! I've said it once and I'll say it again: Portal franchise is a masterpiece. 
It's even more fun when played in Co-op. So grab a copy for yourself and your friend and get to it!

Советую сыграть всем в Portal 2 и в его оригинал, кто любит логически помыслить и пошевелить мозгами. Отличий от оригинала множество, но хочется выделить решение разработчиков расширить и разнообразить сюжетную линию, добавив новых интриг в историю главных героев и присутствие в игре, так называемых "гелей", которые во многом разнообразят геймплей, но насладится их появлением можно лишь *СПОЙЛЕР* в подземных лабораториях Aperture Science, во второй половине игры. Также, на ряду с СинглПлеером присутствует Кооперативный режим. Скучно не будет!

The Portal series has always been one of my favorite. This game is interesting enough, although some kinds of tests are way too boring (like the gel ones). However, this game is even more sarcastic than the first one. Humor is awesome! Must-havePortal.

Clever puzzles, stunning graphics that smells of realism and hilarious dialoges. Portal 2 got it all. Though I haven't played Portal 1 but that doesn't change the fact that  this is truly an AWESOME game, and that makes it my duty as a lover of awesomeness to... ... um... ... ... love it, I guess. ANYWAY, the well thought-out campaign isn't the entire game, exactly. The puzzles continues in the co-op mode where you with the help of a buddy and two HDP's solve what seems like endless test-chambers now thanks to Steam Workshop! 9,5 outta 10! ^^
Very entertaining and yet puzzling :D

Why hasn't anyone recommend me this game earlier! Only one person did and I am greatful now I feel like a moron to not have play this! So... to all my friends that hasnt gotten this yet... WHAT ARE YOU DOING GET IT NOW!!!! Then get a "SMART" friend to play with because its not wise to find a random person....... trust me....
Достаточно веселый кооператив получился :)

Кажется, букально на днях, то есть спустя два года после выхода этой игры, я наткнулась на статью, которая носила следующее название:"%username% организация причислила Portal 2 к объектам искусства". Далее там хвалебно отзывались обо всей игре, любили ее и ласкали. Но я бы возразила статье - зачем ее хвалить, если в нее надо играть. А потом меня осенило - ВЕДЬ ЕСТЬ ЛЮДИ, КОТОРЫЕ НЕ ИГРАЛИ В PORTAL 2! 
Ну, в общем, вы поняли - объект арт-искусства, живое воплощение мечты любого фантаста и просто потрясная игра. И так как Valve совсем не любит цифру 3, думаю, что в третью мы сыграем - в интегрируемой среде на ультра-нексген консолях квантового поколения.
Epic!
With workshop this is practically endless co-op game that never gets boring. Community authors always find how to challenge you in some new way.

A totally new approach to a well-loved game, Portal 2 is a must play for anyone who has played the first.
Though there are new puzzles and a psychadelic story, for experienced Test Subjects this game will be quick and simple. However, for any newly awakened Test Subjects this game could impose a new outlook on life (provided you survive the testing, of course).

Výborná logická hra. Dohráno 2x, poprvé v den kdy to vyšlo.. Špička.. Spíše jednoduší kampaň (z hlediska puzzle), příjemný a svižný příběh.. Puzzle maniaci si užijí hlavně custom levely, Steam Workshop přidává prakticky nekonečnou hrací dobu díky obrovskému množství levelů ke stáhnutí jedním kliknutím. Kdo nehrál, nemůže se nazývat hráčem. 95%
Melhor jogo que eu já joguei na minha vida! Lindo...

Yet another game that is almost essential to your Steam library. Or at least Portal.
Simplemente increible!
This is the co-opinest game ever.

"Hello gamers! Gabe Newell here. Now I know you've heard a lot about the Portal 2 game, but I'm here to tell you Valve isn't banging rocks together over here, we know how to make a quantum space hole game."

The original Portal was the first Valve game I ever played and this sequel not only does it justice, but improves everything about the original 10 fold. With a much longer story, varied visuals, impressive voice acting, but consistent Portal feel, the Single Player campaign is much more engaging and stimulating than the first game and will keep you wanting more even with a satisfying conclusion.

And this time around, we have coop! Not gonna lie to you, the coop puzzles can be much more challenging than the Single player puzzles for obvious reasons (depending on your friends), but being with a friend makes it all the more fun as you verbally work out a puzzle together.

Excellent game.
Intellectual delight.

So this is Portal 2. It's a good sequel. I liked this sequel. Sequel is a funny word. The more I type it out the more I think I typed it out wrong. Hm. Sequel sequel sequel.

Very fun game, the puzzles are challenging, but not too hard. The game overall looks great especially considering the year of release. The story isn't anything special honestly but still fun. And the coop mode is just great, loved playing it with friends and there are enough community puzzles to keep playing for quite some time.

This was a very entertaining and funny game. I enjoyed it just as much or more than the first Portal. It felt like the gameplay was longer and there were more puzzles involved. While it probably took me about 4 hours to finish the 1st game, it took me around 8 hours for this one. I would recommend to anyone that likes puzzle games!

Existem certas partes do jogo que são necessárias praticamente 100% de seu cérebro para serem completas, e eu afirmo, não é todo mundo que consegue afirmar que zerou Portal 2 sem nenhum tipo de guía.
